name: Trickery Domain
description: Clerics of trickery relish mischief and deception.

1.name: Blessing of the Trickster
1.description: As an action, give a creature advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks for 1 hour.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Invoke Duplicity
2.description: Create an illusory duplicate for 1 minute. You can cast spells from the duplicate's space and gain advantage on attacks when both you and the illusion are adjacent to a creature.

6.name: Channel Divinity: Cloak of Shadows
6.description: As an action, become invisible until the end of your next turn or until you attack or cast a spell.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns, deal an extra 1d8 poison damage on a weapon attack (2d8 at 14th level).

17.name: Improved Duplicity
17.description: You can create up to four duplicates with Invoke Duplicity and move any number of them up to 30 feet each as a bonus action.

choices.name: Trickery Domain Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Trickery Domain subclass
